title: I want to know who you ship!

replies.body: Am I the only one who thinks {{champion:268}} X {{champion:133}} should be a thing?

The problems with that are two fold, 

1: Azir is the opposite of Jarven who is Quinn's canon LI or at least crush, so it's likely he really runs counter to her tastes in men,

2: Azir is probably not interested in romance,

his only love is shurima...
{{champion:268}} Xhttp://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/wide_medium/public/upload/2014_09_ending_soon_banner.jpg?itok=c6nBQ-54
Actually, I was talking about Valor.

Valor's only love is the sky, Each beat of his wings a tender but passionate kiss, each time he glides upon a thermal it is a intimate and trusting an act as making love, their's is a love so deep and true, so real and devoted, he can totally poop in front of her and it's cool.

>their's is a love so deep and true, so real and devoted, he can totally poop in front of her and it's cool.

I want a relationship like this.
{{champion:238}} X{{champion:134}}
F**k dat Ionia Authority

{{champion:134}}  x {{champion:39}} 
F**k dat Ionia Authority

{{champion:161}}  I see what you did there

-Proceeds to disintegrate both Syndra and Irelia-

"And know I know why"
{{champion:432}} x{{champion:37}}
I just cant _support_ this ship.

http://41.media.tumblr.com/d97ed9125cfeb3010a747b9f5a702db3/tumblr_n7q7mtZkbr1r6o1dao1_1280.png
http://pre11.deviantart.net/7860/th/pre/f/2014/176/2/1/more_hatshipping_by_ricegnat-d7nzw1p.jpg
braum x shyvana? Interesting I've actually thought about that before, frankly I never cared for jarvan and his basic harem of  girls. What is it, quinn, shyvana and fiora? Something stupid like that.
that's {{champion:127}} without her helmet, which makes sense since {{champion:201}}'s stache could thaw the coldest of hearts... or something cheesy like that :P

{{champion:112}}  x {{champion:61}} 

One is a man who attempts to become a machine...
...The other, a robot that wishes she could become more human.

And together? They can learn to live life as something in between.

This is something I think all {{champion:86}} X {{champion:55}}  fans should know.

"In some ways, Kat and Garen makes no sense at all. And those reaons are why, in my opinion, it makes them perfect for each other."
_-Jaredan 2015_

Rito approves boyyyzzzzzzz
